Description.Text: The hotel is only a few minutes walking distance from the Blue Mosque, Haghia Sophia, Underground Cistern, Mosaic Museum, Islamic and Turkish Art Museum, Topkapi Palace, Spice Bazaar and Grand Bazaar. The unique restaurant is located on the rooftop terrace and arguably offers the best view of magical Sultanahmet. While enjoying a glass of wine or a delicious meal from the gourmet and international kitchen, guests can watch the sunset on St. Sophia, Topkapi Palace and the Blue Mosque. As the boats light up on the Marmara Sea and the bosphorus, guests have the choice of delicious meals influenced by Turkish, Italian and French cuisine. In addition, the bar is stocked with the finest alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks. The hotel offers 18 spacious guest rooms, all of which are tastefully decorated and come equipped with all the essential amenities needed for a pleasant and comfortable stay. All rooms have hardwood floors and king size beds.
